name: Explosive Charge
description: Charge with your divine lance to impale all enemies in the area, dealing 1799 Magic Damage.  Any enemy hit that is casting is interrupted, set Off Balance, and stunned for 3 seconds.
effectLines: Deals damage and interrupts all enemies near the point of impact.  Increases damage dealt.
coefDescription: Charge with your divine lance to impale all enemies in the area, dealing $1 Magic Damage.  Any enemy hit that is casting is interrupted, set Off Balance, and stunned for 3 seconds.
rawDescription:
Charge with your divine lance to impale all enemies in the area, dealing <<1>>.

Any enemy hit that is casting is interrupted, set Off Balance, and stunned for <<2>>.
